header.title: Mods Database Upgrade from 1.0.6 to 1.0.6a
header.description: Adds a simple Mods Database for keeping track of the mods installed on the board with possibility to add various additional information. Mod detail page to view the additional information, admins with appropriate permissions will be able to see installation date on mod detail page.
header.author-notes: Many thanks to kingmob for the great prosilver download button

action-group.diy-instructions: Go to install/index.php in your browser and delete that folder after installation. Don't forget to refresh your templates/themes/imagesets.
